entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
